page.title: 01LOCAL HISTORY
page.content:
{ {DELIGHTFUL ARNSIDE { "Delightful Arnside! If any man loves the beautiful in nature - if he be a geologist, or a botanist, or an invalid in search of peaceful restoration - let him wander about Arnside." EDWIN WAUGH
The village of{Arnside}is at the extreme south of{Cumbria}on the shore of the{Kent Estuary}facing{Morecambe {Bay}and the Irish Sea. The village has a population of just over 2000.
The information for this project was collected by the junior pupils of {Arnside National School
